Body.Subject: RE: Michigan Area Outage? Tickets 5735218 and 5735220
Body.Body:
Hello

Thank you for the reply, tickets will get updated for 72 hour auto closure, ticket can get reopened in that time frame.

Thank You

Josue Michel | Network Engineering, Network Operation Center

Hi Josue,

Calls are connecting now. Earlier users were not able to connect to the hospital DID from verizon cell phones.

Thank you,

Nimish Phulera | Network Convergence Specialist

Subject: RE: Michigan Area Outage? Tickets 5735218 and 5735220

I am following up on MetTel ticket: 5735218 & 5735220 which was opened for inbound Verizon customer calls failing. Could you please provide MetTel with few more call samples to investigate further.  Requesting call examples that are not older than 24 hours at this time. 

Childrens Hospital of Michigan

3901 Beaubien St Detroit MI 48201-2119

DMC Huron Valley-Sinai Hospital

1 William Carls Dr Commerce Twp MI 48382-2201

Call example

Just to be clear the

Destination Number: XXX-XXX-XXXX

Result of the call.

Destination Number: XXX-XXX-XXXX

Thank You

Josue Michel | Network Engineering, Network Operation Center

Subject: RE: Michigan Area Outage? Tickets 5735218 and 5735220

Hello Team

Tickets are under investigation, and bruin will get updated with status.  Please provide a contact for site Children’s Hospital of Michigan, 3901 Beaubien St Detroit, power was verified to site but need a contact to verify phone service.

Thank You

Josue Michel | Network Engineering, Network Operation Center

Subject: Michigan Area Outage? Tickets 5735218 and 5735220

Good Evening Josh/HNOC,

As requested here is the email regarding the tickets that we have opened. There are currently 4 hospitals down in the Michigan area that are unable to make or receive calls. Please identify if there are any outages going on and investigate ASAP. The help is greatly appreciated.

Thank you,

Chance Fashimpaur
